metaDescription: Near  provides a suite of real-time Near data charts and statistics to track everything about NearBlocks : Price, Supply, Marketcap, Transaction Fee and others.
heading: Near Charts & Statistics

nearPrice.metaTitle: Near Price Today : Info, Chart, Stats | NearBlocks
nearPrice.metaDescription: Near Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for Near in USD. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
nearPrice.heading: Near Daily Price (USD) Chart
nearPrice.description: Near Daily Price (USD) chart shows the daily historical price for Near in USD.

marketCap.metaDescription: Near Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Near daily market capitalization and price. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
marketCap.heading: Near Market Capitalization Chart
marketCap.description: Near Market Capitalization chart shows the historical breakdown of Near daily market capitalization and price.

nearSupply.metaTitle: Near Supply Chart : Circulating, Total Supply | NearBlocks
nearSupply.metaDescription: Near blockchain Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily block reward and the total Near supply. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
nearSupply.heading: Near Supply Growth Chart
nearSupply.description: Near Supply Growth Chart shows a breakdown of daily and the total Near supply.

txns.metaTitle: Near Transactions Chart : Info, Statistics, Growth | NearBlocks
txns.metaDescription: Near transactions chart highlights the total number of transactions on Near blockchain blockchain with daily individual breakdown for total transaction , total blocks and total new account seen.
txns.heading: Near Daily Transactions Chart
txns.description: The chart highlights the total number of transactions on Near blockchain with daily individual breakdown for total blocks and total new account seen.

blocks.metaDescription: Near blockchain Block Count Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Near blockchain. All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
blocks.heading: Near Block Count
blocks.description: Near Block Count Chart shows the historical number of blocks produced daily on Near blockchain.

addresses.metaDescription: Near blockchain unique accounts chart shows the total distinct numbers of accounts on Near blockchain and the increase in the number of account daily.
addresses.heading: Near Unique Accounts Chart
addresses.description: The chart shows the total distinct numbers of accounts on Near blockchain and the increase in the number of account daily.

txnFee.metaTitle: Near Transaction Fee History : Transaction Fee | NearBlocks
txnFee.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction fee chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain (â“ƒ). All data is real-time, accurate and pulled directly from Near blockchain.
txnFee.heading: Transaction Fee Chart
txnFee.description: The chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.

txnVolume.metaTitle: Near Transaction Volume Chart : Transaction Volume | NearBlocks
txnVolume.metaDescription: Near blockchain transaction volume chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.
txnVolume.heading: Transaction Volume Chart
txnVolume.description: The chart shows the daily amount in USD spent per transaction on Near blockchain.
